author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
This may be the first time Adam has attempted a mother-of-pearl inlay as part of a One Day Build! While it's a rough attempt to make this inlay for the handle of his Crouching Tiger sword replica, today's build also serves as practice for an upcoming guitar project!

Part 1 of Adam's Crouching Tiger Green Destiny Sword Build: https://youtu.be/i7MtPEPD_YY
Part 2: sharpening the Crouching Tiger sword blade: https://youtu.be/K7BanzKNuk0
TSPROF Knife Sharpener kit: https://amzn.to/4oZkCaa
Dewalt Cordless Brushless Router: https://amzn.to/3NboWpy
Dremel rotary tool kit: https://amzn.to/3YtnjpB

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Josh Self
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Makes a Sword Handle With Wood Inlay!
